A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am not going to rehash all that is wrong with this movie\, considerable effort has been put forth to do this in the previous posts and you tube videos. My Son could write a more compelling storyline that honors the past while breaking ground for the future. Kennedy and Johnson need to be removed from all future projects.
